articles.title: Fukushima: Discharge from Japan nuclear plant safe, tests show - BBC
articles.description: Fukushima operator Tepco reveals sample results after release of contaminated water into Pacific.
articles.content:
The operator of the Fukushima nuclear plant says seawater samples taken around the facility are safe. 
Tepco's test results come a day after the release of treated contaminated water from the plant … [+2955 chars]
